mapper.sql: id, tea_name, tea_code, tel, register_time, modify_time, role_id, role_name
mapper.insert: insert into zptc_user (id, tea_name, tea_code, tel, register_time, modify_time, role_id, role_name, password) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{teaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

teaName = #{teaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

roleId = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
roleName = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update zptc_user set teaName = #{teaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teaCode = #{teaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, roleId = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, roleName = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
